archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.4.2c: c) defining trigger events or circumstances for escalating information risk-related decisions (e.g. if a security requirement cannot be fulfilled, when a design change would affect the outcome of a privacy or risk assessment, or if a security control is ineffective)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
